text: The F63 Condor is a Ship-Launched Fighter manufactured by Core Dynamics, produced from 3302 to the present. It costs 15,270 CR and is not insurable. It is part of the starter loadout in the CQC Championship, coming with two pulse lasers and a Chaff Launcher as default.
The F63 Condor has dimensions of 13.5m x 10.5m x 2.5m, with an armor rating of 25 and shields of 25 MJ. Its top speed ranges from 316-327 m/s, and boost speed ranges from 536-554 m/s.

The F63 Condor has one utility mount and two weapon mounts. It is unique among Ship-Launched Fighters for its ability to mount Multi-cannons, allowing it to inflict more hull damage than other options.
